Description: Case of wooden anthropoid coffin of Nesmut; painted detail on plaster; Hieroglyphic text; foot-board lost.
Curator's comments: PM I Part 2: p.638 Taylor in Davies, Colour and Painting, London 2001, p. 171, col. pl. 52 [1]. Minas-Nerpel, Der Gott Chepri (OLA 154, 2006), 319, note 889. Niwinsky, 21st Dynasty Coffins from Thebes, Theben 5, 1988. 153f, no. 271. Teichmann, Die Agyptischen Mysterien, Stuttgart 1999, 155, Abb. 84
